name: Ramadan Magic Mat Free
description: Discover a new way of playing Snake and Ladders game. Play the most addictive childhood game in a new avatar as Ramadan Magic Mat. Experience the exotic delights of ancient Arabia and be amazed by mysterious game play. The objective of the game is to reach at the Macca first. You have to beat the opponent by reaching before him. Start the game by making a wish of your desired number and spin the wish wheel and see if it comes true. Get bonus chance if you get number 6. The magic carpets will fly up and drop you anywhere on the board. And magic lamp will fly you up and drop at 91. The hell door and magician will throw you down back. The magic lamp and hell door will appear at a new place in the same row after each turn of opponent. The game features real and fictional characters that will keep you engaged and addicted for hours in a fantastic ancient theme. Let’s see how long you manage to beat the opponent?
